A 31-year-old male driver is facing charges after police responded to a collision involving the LRT on King Street West in Kitchener.

Anyone who witnessed the collision or has dashcam footage is encouraged to call police at 519-570-9777, extension 6399.

Replacement shuttle buses are running.
